page.body:
This sample site allows you to manage a blog using multiple authors, categories and tags for the posts.

All content is exposed by a flexible REST API:

get endpoint using an id:

  • /api/1/author/{id}.json
  • /api/1/post/{id}.json

list endpoints support 'start' and 'rows' parameters for pagination:

  • /api/1/author/list.json
  • /api/1/category/list.json
  • /api/1/tag/list.json

list posts endpoint also supports 'author', 'categories', 'tags' parameters. A special 'q' parameter supports text search in the body of the posts:

  • /api/1/post/list.json
